alert.note: Alert for Central Yampa River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 04 at 3:11AM MDT until April 05 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 7 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 9 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...For the first Wind Advisory, southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected mainly north of Highway 40. For the second Wind Advisory, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. Locally higher gusts possible on ridges above 7500 feet. * WHERE...Lower Yampa River Basin and Central Yampa River Basin. * WHEN...For the first Wind Advisory, from 1 PM this afternoon to 7 PM MDT this evening. For the second Wind Advisory, from 10 AM to 9 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Yampa River Basin; Lower Yampa River Basin
